name: education-toolkit-marketplace
description: Comprehensive marketplace of 17 specialized plugins for educational developers, instructional designers, and course creators. Includes course design, assessment tools, accessibility auditing, consistency checking, and quality assurance agents.

plugins.name: accessibility-auditor
plugins.description: Audit HTML/CSS files for WCAG 2.2 AA accessibility compliance

plugins.name: assessment-consistency-checker
plugins.description: Validate assessment consistency across course weeks (PAIRR methodology, rubrics, grading)

plugins.name: assessment-designer
plugins.description: Comprehensive assessment design with AI integration, UDL/QM compliance, and 464 KB knowledge base

plugins.name: backend-reviewer
plugins.description: Expert FastAPI/Python code reviewer for educational technology projects

plugins.name: branding-checker
plugins.description: Validate course content against platform branding guidelines (Canvas LMS or Uplimit)

plugins.name: cohort-structure-checker
plugins.description: Validate cohort course structural consistency (modules, elements, PAIRR, Final Project Connections)

plugins.name: concept-threading-checker
plugins.description: Validate concept threading across course weeks (Week 1 concepts in later weeks)

plugins.name: course-outline-creator
plugins.description: Create strategic course outlines with CLOs, weekly structure, MLOs, and assessment strategy

plugins.name: frontend-reviewer
plugins.description: Expert React/JSX code reviewer with WCAG 2.2 AA accessibility specialization

plugins.name: peer-review-simulator
plugins.description: Simulate design review panel with 6 instructional design specialists

plugins.name: rubric-generator
plugins.description: Quick rubric generation from learning outcomes (QM-aligned, student and faculty versions)

plugins.name: student-journey-simulator
plugins.description: Simulate student experiences and test course flow across multiple weeks

plugins.name: terminology-consistency-checker
plugins.description: Validate terminology consistency and build course glossary

plugins.name: udl-content-generator
plugins.description: Create alternative content formats and implement Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles

plugins.name: uplimit-storyboard-builder
plugins.description: Create and audit storyboards for Uplimit platform (BUILD and AUDIT modes)

plugins.name: widget-designer
plugins.description: Generate new interactive widgets with standardized design system or audit existing widgets

plugins.name: widget-tester
plugins.description: Test interactive educational widgets with simulated student personas
